name: Ice gift hunt
description:
Welcome to "Ice gift hunt", a game based on sci-fi webcomic Gifts of wandering ice a sci-fi story about curious things people find in ancient icebergs.

Don't worry, you can play it even if you haven't read the comic, but it'd be more interesting if you had.

"Ice gift hunt" is a visual novel, a kind of interactive book where you
choose your own adventure. Remember: your choices matter!
